skills.Name: Sword/Blunt Weapon Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 1.5 when using a sword or blunt weapon.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 20.5 and decreases received Critical Damage by 15% when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: M. Def.
skills.Description: Increases M. Def. by 24.

skills.Name: Shield Mastery
skills.Description: Increases Shield Defense by 30% and Defense Rate by 50%.

skills.Name: Shield Stun
skills.Description: Stuns an enemy for 5 seconds with 200 Power. Requires a shield.

skills.Name: Superior Aggression
skills.Description: Provokes the target to attack with 6600 Power.

skills.Name: Energetic Yell
skills.Description: Yell with energetic vigor, aggravating the target for 4000 Power and regains 25%% MP.

skills.Name: Knight Slash
skills.Description: You swing your weapon in a heroic slash, dealing 275 physical damage. Requires a sword, blunt, or dual weapon. Over-hit is possible.

skills.Name: Divine Slash
skills.Description: You bless your sword in holy magic, slashing your target healing them for 275 Power. Requires a sword, blunt, or dual weapon to be equipped.
